mdRecord.dcterms:title: Form for 'Colored Persons' drafted into Military Service for the United States, 1864 May 10
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Partial printed form from the Provost Marshal's Office, 5th District Maryland, Ellicott's Mills. The form is dated May 10, 1864 for 'Sarah A. Petre' and her provision of two 'Colored Persons' enrolled for service on the 19th day of March 1864, in the 4th district of Montgomery County, Maryland. The names listed are Robert Murray, age 35 and James Ricks, age 35. Document, 2 pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Slavery
